item.title: Citrix XenServer is Now Fully Open Source
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: http://brightcove.vo.llnwd.net/e1/uds/pd/13639319001/13639319001_2488040716001_XenServer-OSS-Richard-Sharp-Final.mp4 With the release of Citrix XenServer 6.2, Citrix is pleased to announce that XenServer is now fully open source. In this video, Richard Sharp, Vice President of XenServer Product Development, explains why Citrix open sourced XenServer, what it means to our customers and how it will help the entire XenServer platform.
